title: Locomotion
creator_credit: Geoffrey Jones Films, British Transport Films and Geoffrey Jones
brief_description: Documentary celebrating 100 years of British railway history and the opening of the world’s first steam hauled public railway, the Stockton and Darlington Line. Its first engine became known as “Locomotion”. Uses collections of prints and sketches of people and architectural sights from a variety of museums and archival and picture libraries in the United Kingdom.
